div.bibl: THE PHILIPPINE MESSENGER, Vol. III, No. 10, May 3, 1936

body.p: The Center's Debating Society meets every Thursday evening in the Social Hall. Last Thursday the subject for debate was, "Resolved that the Re-militarization of the Rineland is Justified."
The Judges were: Miguel Alojado, Lois Quinanio and Pascual Capiz. The assembly voted in favor of the affirmative side, while the Judges voted in favor of the negative.
Attend our debates. They are always interesting.
